WB_DipWater.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome dipping billet into water.
WB_DipWater.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-237.344574;3.818551;-1067.716553&camTarget=-236.821594;3.098400;-1068.172485Wait for gnome to start its behavior

Merchant.synopsis: Ironhand gnome merchant hiding in a smithy cellar
Merchant.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main_A. Debug book "Quest Flags and Options" -> Act3 -> Ironhand Gnomes -> Setup a predefined company of gnomes -> 1. Set up Oppress Scene.Debug Book -> Go To Region -> Act3 -> WYR -> Ironhand gnomes hideout.Find merchant gnome and talk to him. If a crime dialog is started, mention Barcus or Wulbren or "I'm here to trade" option.

AD_RunRunRun.synopsis: Gnomes running away from Steel Watcher after checkpoint scene. ONLY ONE SPEAKER IS PRESENT

WB_TakeShelf.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome taking some ingredients from a shelf
WB_TakeShelf.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-240.840866;3.870597;-1067.913086&camTarget=-241.021042;3.557698;-1068.845581Wait for gnome to start behavior.

AD_FollowMe.synopsis: When escaped from WYR south checkpoint scene and player follows the gnomes, this is their AD inside the cave passage to gnomes hideout.ONLY ONE GNOME IS PRESENT IN THIS DILAOG

WB_DigCoal_01.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome throwing coal with a spade from a pile to furnace.
WB_DigCoal_01.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-240.840866;3.870597;-1067.913086&camTarget=-241.021042;3.557698;-1068.845581Wait for gnome to start behavior.

WB_Dropoff.synopsis: World timeline for gnomes dropping off some metal junk into a pile.
WB_Dropoff.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-237.074951;4.177327;-1064.510620&camTarget=-236.778854;3.577391;-1065.253906If trespassing dialog starts - say you're here for Wulbren.Watch the gnome doing its behaviors.

ArtificerExtra_001.synopsis: In case only 2 gnomes from Act1/2 made it to Act3, this gnome is added inside Ironhand basement.

AD_Wulbren.synopsis: Behaviour AD of Wulbren in Ironhand basement at tables with papers, schematics, letters.

AD_HatchLocked.synopsis: AD for players trying to get into (or out of) Ironhand gnomes' basement through the smithy hatch. Until they use a lever, the hatch is locked.

WB_TakeFromRack_01.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome taking a sword from a rack.
WB_TakeFromRack_01.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-242.715210;4.081895;-1067.289185&camTarget=-243.556961;3.543635;-1067.247559Wait for the gnome to start behavior.

AD_ChemistryGnome.synopsis: Behaviour AD for a gnome that's doing chemistry work at Ironhand basement.Can be Thulla or |Fuffi Fuffers| (replacement in case Thulla is not present).

WB_PutOnRack_02.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome picking sword from a rack.
WB_PutOnRack_02.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-247.619934;3.765666;-1069.583252&camTarget=-247.765961;3.341375;-1068.689575Use ReCon command `oe wyr_iron_skipscene`Wait for the gnome to start its behavior.

PAD_Footprints.synopsis: A VB near the secret cave entrance to the Ironhand gnomes' hideout where the player spots footprints leading into it.

Welcome.synopsis: Gnome S_WYR_Ironhand_Artificer_002 stands near cave entrance into Ironhand basement lab. It greets player with a dialog. If player follows gnomes after checkpoint, they're included in the dialog.
Welcome.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main_A. Debug book "Quest Flags and Options" -> Act3 -> Ironhand Gnomes -> Setup all gnomes.To test this dialog without inclusions:Debug book -> Go to region -> Act3 -> WYR -> Ironhand gnomes hideoutThen walk into the hideout, the gnome at the entrance should stop you with this dialog.To test with inclusions, use:Debug book -> "Quest flags an Options" -> Act3 -> Ironhand Gnomes -> Test WYR_Ironhand_Welcome dialog.Then choose which speaker you'd wish to include.

Artificer_002.synopsis: Ironhand gnome artificer hiding in a smithy cellar
Artificer_002.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main_A. Debug book "Quest Flags and Options" -> Act3 -> Ironhand Gnomes -> Setup a predefined company of gnomes -> 1. Set up Oppress Scene.Debug Book -> Go To Region -> Act3 -> WYR -> Ironhand gnomes hideout.Find artificer gnome and talk to him. If a crime dialog is started, mention Barcus or Wulbren or "I'm here to trade" option.

WB_Pickup.synopsis: World timeline for gnomes picking up some metal junk from a box.

AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead.synopsis: Gnomes return from bridge scene, but Wulbren was killed in the meantime.

WB_LookDocuments.synopsis: Animation timeline of Wulbren looking through documents at a table.

AD_CommentGnomesBackHome.synopsis: Philomeen inside basement sees gnomes coming back from checkpoint scene and greets them surprised.

AD_GnomeThrowsGrenade.synopsis: Gnome's AD when throwing a sunflash grenade at Steel Watcher at WYR south checkpoint.ONLY ONE GNOME IS PRESENT IN DIALOG

AD_PlayerPicksBomb.synopsis: When player picks up Runepowder time bomb, nearby gnome comments with a warning.

WB_TakeFromRack_02.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome picking sword from a rack.

ArtificerExtra_002.synopsis: In case only 2 gnomes from Act1/2 made it to Act3, this gnome is added inside Ironhand basement.

AD_UnfortunateGnome.synopsis: Behaviour AD for Barcus in Ironhand basement near book shelves.

WB_Smithing.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome smithing at an anvil.

WB_SearchBooks_01.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-258.593384;3.016551;-1075.183716&camTarget=-258.848938;2.752107;-1076.113647Wait for gnome to start this behavior

WB_TweakBench_02.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome tinkering with a sword at a workbench.
WB_TweakBench_02.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-242.715210;4.081895;-1067.289185&camTarget=-243.556961;3.543635;-1067.247559Wait for the gnome to start behavior.

Merchant_WB_Pickup_Pile.synopsis: World timeline for gnomes picking up some metal junk from a pile.
Merchant_WB_Pickup_Pile.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-237.074951;4.177327;-1064.510620&camTarget=-236.778854;3.577391;-1065.253906If trespassing dialog starts - say you're here for Wulbren.Watch the gnome doing its behaviors.

Merchant_WB_PutOnrack.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome putting weapon on a rack.
Merchant_WB_PutOnrack.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-237.344574;3.818551;-1067.716553&camTarget=-236.821594;3.098400;-1068.172485Wait for gnome to start its behavior

AD_GnomesBackHome.synopsis: AD between Wulbren and Barcus after Wulbren returns from WYR south checkpoint scene

Merchant_1.speaker: Bumpnagel
Merchant_1.text: You'll be getting a mouthful of sparks at this rate. Unless you've got any decent metal on you, I'm not interested.
Merchant_1.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - this is the second time the player's interrupted him

Merchant_0.speaker: Player
Merchant_0.text: Do you have anything to trade?

Merchant_3.speaker: Bumpnagel
Merchant_3.context: NodeContext: Mildly irritated; he's busy smithing

Merchant_4.speaker: Bumpnagel
Merchant_4.text: Now let me get back to it.
Merchant_4.context: NodeContext: Mildly irritated; he's busy smithing

Merchant_2.speaker: Bumpnagel
Merchant_2.text: You think I want my clan facing down one of those walking death machines with cutlery? Then leave me to my work.
Merchant_2.context: NodeContext: Mildly irritated; he's busy smithing

AD_FollowMe_0.speaker: Dulbers Frint
AD_FollowMe_0.context: NodeContext: Slightly frantic (out of immediate danger but still not completely safe)

AD_FollowMe_1.speaker: Nimble
AD_FollowMe_1.context: NodeContext: Slightly frantic (out of immediate danger but still not completely safe)

ArtificerExtra_001_0.speaker: Gipkins Jared
ArtificerExtra_001_0.text: Unless you've got any spare silver ingots, you can piss right off.
ArtificerExtra_001_0.context: NodeContext: Irritated at being interrupted by the player

ArtificerExtra_001_1.speaker: Gipkins Jared
ArtificerExtra_001_1.text: Don't bother - you look like the pig iron sort to me.

AD_Wulbren_0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
AD_Wulbren_0.text: By powder and fire, we'll win this.
AD_Wulbren_0.context: NodeContext: muttered to himself as he prepares for a campaign of freedom fighting from his HQ

AD_Wulbren_1.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
AD_Wulbren_1.text: Fresh letters - support for our cause.
AD_Wulbren_1.context: NodeContext: talking to himself about letters on the desk before him

AD_Wulbren_2.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
AD_Wulbren_2.text: Steel soldiers are no match for Ironhand ingenuity.
AD_Wulbren_2.context: NodeContext: talking to himself in an assured manner

AD_HatchLocked_0.speaker: Player
AD_HatchLocked_0.text: It's locked - from the other side. Wonder where it leads?

AD_HatchLocked_1.speaker: Player
AD_HatchLocked_1.text: Locked - but there's no keyhole. Must be a switch or something nearby.

AD_ChemistryGnome_0.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers, Thulla
AD_ChemistryGnome_0.text: Surprisingly pleasant odour - I should sell this as perfume.

AD_ChemistryGnome_1.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers, Thulla
AD_ChemistryGnome_1.text: A pinch of this, a dash of that. Like baking a cake.

AD_ChemistryGnome_2.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers, Thulla
AD_ChemistryGnome_2.text: Need to get the quantities just right...

PAD_Footprints_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Footprints_1.text: Footprints! Leading right into that cave.
PAD_Footprints_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Non-Underdark character comment, perception success

PAD_Footprints_2.speaker: Player
PAD_Footprints_2.text: Something's off here... but I'm not sure what.
PAD_Footprints_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Non-Underdark character comment, perception failure

Welcome_7.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Welcome_7.text: The Ironhand Gnomes can always use more friends, particularly in times like these.

Welcome_16.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Welcome_16.text: I'd advise you to go back the way you came.

Welcome_5.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Welcome_5.text: He's expecting you - hasn't forgotten what you did for him at Moonrise.

Welcome_1.speaker: Player
Welcome_1.text: I was hoping to find my old pal Barcus Wroot.

Welcome_17.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Welcome_17.text: He's inside - but catch up with him later.

Welcome_4.speaker: Player
Welcome_4.text: Just looking for a place to spend the night.

Welcome_8.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Welcome_8.text: The boss is expecting you - hasn't forgotten what you did for him at Moonrise.

Artificer_002_0.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Artificer_002_0.text: Bet it's lovely strolling around not worrying about getting squished by a Steel Watcher, hm?

Artificer_002_1.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Artificer_002_1.text: You know what it's like to have Steel Watchers stomping after you, I bet. Blasted things.

Artificer_002_2.speaker: Hogi Nuners
Artificer_002_2.text: Two days just to get hold of a Steel Watcher optic module - and for what? Waste of time we don't have.

AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_2.speaker: Nimble
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_2.text: Wulbren's gone... We will avenge him. We will uphold the cause!
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_2.context: NodeContext: Sad - segueing into determination (albeit still sad)

AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_8.speaker: Apprentice Laridda
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_8.text: We have to get out of here before they find us!

AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_4.speaker: Thulla
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_4.context: NodeContext: A little shaken but taking charge

AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_11.speaker: Philomeen
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_11.text: Get moving, the lot of you - if we get caught, Wulbren will've died for nothing.
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_11.context: NodeContext: Harsh; values the cause more than Wulbren himself

AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_10.speaker: Dulbers Frint
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_10.text: Wulbren's dead? Gh'rack! Now what do we do?
AD_GnomesBackHome_WulbrenDead_10.context: NodeContext: Anger/panic; at a loss re what to do now Wulbren's gone. "Gh'rack" pronounced GRACK (means "damn it").

Artificer_001_0.speaker: Dulbers Frint
Artificer_001_0.text: Look, unless you're an expert in Steel Watcher gyroscopics, please get out of my light.

Artificer_001_1.speaker: Dulbers Frint
Artificer_001_1.text: Keep your stubby sausage fingers away from my instruments, xallihoon - I don't have time to replace them.
Artificer_001_1.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at having been disturbed again. Xallihoon pronounced "ZA-lee HOON" (zally hoon) - perjorative name for an annoying outsider

AD_CommentGnomesBackHome_0.speaker: Hogi Nuners
AD_CommentGnomesBackHome_0.text: Back so soon? Lemme guess: Steel Watchers.
AD_CommentGnomesBackHome_0.context: NodeContext: Mildly surprised about the first part but definitely not the second (and clear distaste for said Steel Watchers))

AD_CommentGnomesBackHome_1.speaker: Hogi Nuners
AD_CommentGnomesBackHome_1.text: And you're not alone I see.
AD_CommentGnomesBackHome_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Player is following the 2 gnomes

AD_GnomeThrowsGrenade_0.speaker: Nimble
AD_GnomeThrowsGrenade_0.context: NodeContext: Impassioned (throwing a flash grenade at a giant robot)

AD_GnomeThrowsGrenade_1.speaker: Dulbers Frint
AD_GnomeThrowsGrenade_1.context: NodeContext: Nervous but excited (throwing a flash grenade at a giant robot)

AD_PlayerPicksBomb_0.speaker: Thulla
AD_PlayerPicksBomb_0.text: Make sure you blow that thing up in the right place - Wulbren's counting on you.
AD_PlayerPicksBomb_0.context: NodeContext: Slightly concerned about the explosive but also earnest that Wulbren's will is enacted

AD_PlayerPicksBomb_1.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers
AD_PlayerPicksBomb_1.text: For Gaerdal's sake, be careful with that thing.
AD_PlayerPicksBomb_1.context: NodeContext: Warning; the player is handling a deadly explosive

ArtificerExtra_002_0.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers
ArtificerExtra_002_0.text: It's too quiet up there. Hope the blacksmith hasn't sold us out - or you.
ArtificerExtra_002_0.context: NodeContext: Irritable anxiety; accusatory of the player on "you"

ArtificerExtra_002_1.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers
ArtificerExtra_002_1.text: If anyone comes down here with ill intent, they're gonna regret it. Pass it on, friend.

AD_UnfortunateGnome_0.speaker: Barcus Wroot
AD_UnfortunateGnome_0.text: 'The Annals of Baldur's Gate'. I hope the city has many more annals to come.
AD_UnfortunateGnome_0.context: NodeContext: first phrase, reading a book title out loud as you look at bookshelves. Then pondering it.

AD_UnfortunateGnome_1.speaker: Barcus Wroot
AD_UnfortunateGnome_1.text: I should write a book - 'Wroot and Branch: An Unfortunate Life'.
AD_UnfortunateGnome_1.context: NodeContext: muttering to yourself - the book title is a pun on your name, Wroot, pronounced 'root'.

AD_UnfortunateGnome_2.speaker: Barcus Wroot
AD_UnfortunateGnome_2.context: NodeContext: muttering to yourself as you look through bookshelves

AD_GnomesBackHome_2.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
AD_GnomesBackHome_2.context: NodeContext: Relieved; was clearly worried Wulbren wasn't going to come back

AD_GnomesBackHome_1.text: Stop fussing! One of those Gondian scrapheaps waylaid us at the gates is all.
AD_GnomesBackHome_1.context:
NodeContext: Irritated at/dismissive of Barcus's concern.
 Gondian = GOND-ee-un.

AD_GnomesBackHome_0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
AD_GnomesBackHome_0.text: That smell... You used the sunflash grenade?

AD_GnomesBackHome_3.text: Worked a treat. Watcher lost track of us right away - we'd have been stomped to paste without the grenade.
